sentences.sentence: If you hover over the icon or space to the right of the label, you will not see the disabled cursor style.
sentences.translation: 如果将鼠标悬浮于图标或该标签右侧的空白处，将看不到这个禁用了的光标样式。

sentences.sentence: Hover Camera records movements with a 13MP camera and takes 4K videos.
sentences.translation: 无人相机可以用1300万像素记录运动，拍摄 4K 视频。

sentences.sentence: With the development of science and technology, a Chinese young man Wang Mengqiu, invented Hover Camera.
sentences.translation: 随着科技的发展，中国年轻人王梦秋发明了无人相机。
